Contact Us

Please make sure to review the documentation on this site before you submit a question. Every tool under Test Armada has documentation and a FAQ section. Select a Fleet from the homepage and then select a language from the appropriate Platform card to get to the documentation area. If you can’t find the answer you’re looking for, feel free to Slack us, Email us or file a support ticket through our Jira Service Desk.
